fi.cs.helsinki.glindstr.soccerdb.dao
Interface GameDao

All Superinterfaces:
BaseDao<Game>
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameDaoImpl
public interface GameDao
extends BaseDao<Game>

An interface for database operations on the game table. The GameDao interface provides a method for gaining a list of all games.

Method Summary
 java.util.List<Game> getAllGames()
          Returns a list containing all leagues in the database.
 Game getGameById(int id)
          Returns a game record from the database based on the id.
 void updateScore(Game game)
          Updates the result of the specified game.

delete, recordExists, save
